summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, among personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) and a contractor, scheduling a meeting to discuss the MCC/Epstein case. The meeting is to include PC chiefs, the MCC team, and visitors from DC/Main Justice.

connections.description: M has a pre-scheduled meeting with Z, which conflicts with the proposed MCC/Epstein case meeting.

events.title: MCC/Epstein Case Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled from 12pm-2pm in the 8th floor library to discuss the MCC/Epstein case, involving PC chiefs, the MCC team, and visitors from DC/Main Justice.

locations: 8th floor library (presumably within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: A high-level meeting was scheduled for August 15, 2019, to discuss the MCC/Epstein case.
The meeting was to include PC chiefs, the MCC team, and officials from DC/Main Justice, indicating coordinated federal attention on the case.

The email chain shows logistical coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the case shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in MCC custody on August 10, 2019.
